attributes.action: Introduce short term - minimum 1 year, PBS dependant or Tier 2  VISA
attributes.additional_details: There are lot of cases where immigrants are required to pay hefty unnecessary charges. This is due to the rule that PBS can be only extended for minimum 3 years even if they require 1 month extension.
attributes.background:
An immigrant on PBS system shall eligible to apply Indefinite Leave to Remain if he or she continuously lived in UK for 5 years on that particular applicable category.

Immigrants are required to pay the minimum 3 year charges, even if they require 1 month leave to be eligible for ILR.

rejection.details:

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
